attributes.action: Address concerns about potential changes to food regulation and legalisation
attributes.background: In light of future trading deals with the U.S., the public needs assurance that the government won't lower UK food regulation and legalisation.  Food standards are different in the USA with GM foods, increased fat/sugar/caffeine content, different labelling standards, all being key concerns.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
